dct_title_s: Map of a portion of Fresno County, California
dct_alternative_sm: Best climate for invalids is in Fresno County, California
Map of summer & winter resorts and other places upon and near the Central & Southern Pacific railroads in California
dct_description_sm: Shows also drainage, railroads, land ownership, section lines, etc.
Vineyards and orchards are outlined in orange. Colonies are noted with orange throughout the section.
Inset: Map of summer & winter resorts and other places upon and near the Central & Southern Pacific railroads in California / D. Van Vleck ; F.T. Newbery del.
Text on verso with caption title: The best climate for invalids is in Fresno County, California.
